channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned Furniture Again on Love Walk, 4th September
item.description:
There is abandoned cabinets, bed frames and mattress on Love Walk. I would be grateful if the council would kindly remove the waste. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Love Walk, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blue top not emptied, 4th September
item.description:
For 2nd week running, blue top bin not emptied on given day (Thursday). If the council has decided to change the collection day, then please notify the relevant people/area.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garden illegally being used for children care after school and weekends, 4th September
item.description:
In the last 14 months the communal garden has been used illegally as a child care provision during school holidays, weekends and after school. The no ball game sign has been taken down,littering of toys,bikes,furniture,rugs,trampolin, antisocial noise.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Murrain Road, Hackney, London

item.description:

item.title: Fruit tree causing slip hazard, 4th September
item.description:
The tree located on Bourne Road, close to the top of Haywood Road is causing a real issue over the driveways and pavement. With the fruits falling rapidly each day the surrounding houses are having to sweep these onto the road side. The fruits are squashed all over the pavement and is causing a sticky mess. The fruits are also falling onto the drive ways, when the fruits are squashed they are extremely sticky and slippery. The branches are now overhanging onto the pavement and to the houses adjacent to the tree. This is really not a suitable tree for a pavement that has lots of footfall including lots of young children.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
